turmoric package

Submodules

turmoric.apply_thresholds module

turmoric.apply_thresholds.apply_li_threshold(file, size)[source]

Applies Li thresholding to all .tif images in the input folder (and subfolders) and saves the binary masks in the output folder.

Parameters: - input_folder: Path to the folder containing .tif images. - output_folder: Path to save the processed binary masks. - min_object_size: Minimum size of objects to retain in the binary mask.

turmoric.apply_thresholds.apply_li_threshold_recursively(input_folder, output_folder='./li_output/', threshold_method='li')[source]
turmoric.apply_thresholds.threshold_helper_func(threshold)[source]

turmoric.cell_analysis module

turmoric.cell_analysis.apply_regionprops(file, properties_list)[source]
turmoric.cell_analysis.apply_regionprops_recursively(input_folder, properties_list=('area', 'bbox_area', 'centroid', 'convex_area', 'eccentricity', 'equivalent_diameter', 'euler_number', 'extent', 'filled_area', 'major_axis_length', 'minor_axis_length', 'orientation', 'perimeter', 'solidity'))[source]

Processes all .npy files in the input folder (and subfolders), applies labeling, calculates properties, and saves results in a CSV file.

Parameters: - input_folder: Path to the folder containing .npy files. - properties_list: List of properties to calculate using regionprops_table.

turmoric.vampire_model module

class turmoric.vampire_model.VampireModelTrainer(base_path: str, treatments: List[str], groups: List[str])[source]

Bases: object

A class to handle VAMPIRE model training and application for brain image analysis.

apply_model(test_base_path: Path) → None[source]

Apply the trained model to test datasets.

Parameters:

test_base_path – Base path for test datasets

create_apply_dataframe(test_base_path: Path, model_path: Path) → DataFrame[source]

Create a DataFrame for applying the trained model to test datasets.

Parameters:

  • test_base_path – Base path for test datasets

  • model_path – Path to the trained model

Returns:

DataFrame with application configuration

extract_features(image_set_path: Path) → None[source]

Extract features from images using VAMPIRE.

Parameters:

image_set_path – Path to the image dataset

run_full_pipeline(training_subpath: str = 'training/vampire_data', testing_subpath: str = 'testing/vampire_data') → None[source]

Run the complete training and application pipeline.

Parameters:

  • training_subpath – Relative path to training data

  • testing_subpath – Relative path to testing data

train_model(image_set_path: Path, model_name: str = 'li', num_points: int = 50, num_clusters: int = 5) → Path[source]

Train a VAMPIRE model on the extracted features.

Parameters:

  • image_set_path – Path to the training image dataset

  • model_name – Name identifier for the model

  • num_points – Number of points for model training

  • num_clusters – Number of clusters for model training

Returns:

Path to the trained model file
